activities.name: Copy Items Detail to Json file

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT       ITEMS.item_id AS [Item ID], ITEMS.inventory_item_id AS [Item No], ITEMS.organization_id AS [Org ID], ITEMS.warehouse_descrp AS Warehouse, ITEMS.description AS Description, 
                         ITEMS.product_cat AS [Prod Cat], ITEMS.product_sub_cat AS [Prod Sub Cat], ITEMS.nature_code AS [Nature Code], ITEMS.buyer AS Buyer, ITEMS.analyste AS Analyst, 
                         ITEMS.MANUFACTURER_PART_NUM AS [Manuf Part Num], ITEMS.MANUFACTURER_NAME AS [Manuf Name], SP_LIST_MAIN_TEMP.VENDOR_ID AS [Preferred Supplier No], 
                         SP_LIST_MAIN_TEMP.VENDOR_NAME AS [Preferred Supplier Name], ITEMS.CONTRACT AS Contract, ITEMS.saisonalite AS Seasonality, ITEMS.Intermittent, ITEMS.status AS Status, ITEMS.stockable AS Stockable, 
                         ITEMS.units AS UOM, ITEMS.creation_date AS [Creation Date], ITEMS.family AS Family, ITEMS.family_descrp AS [Family Desc], ITEMS.criticality AS Criticality, dbo.CRITICALITY.Description AS [Criticality Desc], 
                         ITEMS.class AS [Class Final], ITEMS.class_auto AS [Class Auto], ITEMS.class_manual AS [Class Man], dbo.CLASSES_FAMILY.description AS [Class Desc], ITEMS.modified_man_reason AS [Reason Class Chg], 
                         ITEMS.lead_time AS [LT Final], ITEMS.lead_time_auto AS [LT Auto], ITEMS.lead_time_man AS [LT Man], ITEMS.lead_time_req_rec AS [LT Theo], ITEMS.demand_multiple AS [Usage Multiple], 
                         ITEMS.nbr_per_reord AS [Number of mths to order], ITEMS.std_pack_multiple AS [Std Pack], SP_LIST_MAIN_TEMP.SS_final AS [SS Final], ITEMS.qty_ss_item AS [SS Auto], ITEMS.qty_ss_item_man AS [SS Man], 
                         SP_LIST_MAIN_TEMP.MIN_final AS [Min Final], ITEMS.reord_pt_item AS [Min Auto], ITEMS.reord_pt_item_man AS [Min Man], SP_LIST_MAIN_TEMP.MAX_final AS [Max Final], ITEMS.qty_max_item AS [Max Auto], 
                         ITEMS.qty_max_item_man AS [Max Man], (CASE WHEN items.qty_max_item_man IS NULL THEN 'false' ELSE 'true' END) AS [Manually Managed], ITEMS.qty_ss_item_man_reason AS [Reason SS Min Max chg], 
                         ITEMS.MAX_SHELF AS [Max Shelf], ITEMS.avg_cost AS [Avg Unit Cost], ITEMS.reord_cost AS [Current Cost], ITEMS.qoh_qty AS [Qty on Hand], ITEMS.atp_qty AS [Net Inventory], ITEMS.po_qty AS [Qty on Order], 
                         ITEMS.req_qty AS [Qty Required], ITEMS.reserved_qty AS [Qty Reserved], ITEMS.recv_qty AS [Qty in Transit], ITEMS.Nb_Month_Zero_Demand AS [Nb Mths Zero Dmd], 
                         SP_LIST_MAIN_TEMP.DMD_1_12_Month AS [Dmd last 1-12 mths], SP_LIST_MAIN_TEMP.DMD_12_24_Month AS [Dmd last 13-24 mths], SP_LIST_MAIN_TEMP.DMD_24_36_Month AS [Dmd last 25-36 mths], 
                         SP_LIST_MAIN_TEMP.hits_12_M AS [Hits last 1-12 mths], SP_LIST_MAIN_TEMP.SUM_QTY_FORECAST AS [Fcst 12 mths]
FROM            dbo.ITEMS INNER JOIN
                         dbo.SP_LIST_MAIN_TEMP ON dbo.ITEMS.item_id = dbo.SP_LIST_MAIN_TEMP.item_id LEFT OUTER JOIN
                         dbo.CLASSES_FAMILY ON dbo.ITEMS.class = dbo.CLASSES_FAMILY.class AND dbo.ITEMS.family = dbo.CLASSES_FAMILY.Family_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN
                         dbo.CRITICALITY ON dbo.ITEMS.criticality = dbo.CRITICALITY.criticality
WHERE        (ITEMS.DELETION_FLAG IS NULL)
ORDER BY ITEMS.item_id

Declare @PercUnused float
execute  QS_DB_PERC_UNUSED @PercUnused output
select @PercUnused

ifFalseActivities.name: Copy data from SQL export to SFTP

body.value:
{
    "EmailTo": "jmichaud@rpmglobal.com;vpotvin@rpmglobal.com",
    "Subject": "@{pipeline().Pipeline} has completed",
    "FactoryName": "@{pipeline().DataFactory}",
    "PipelineName": "@{pipeline().Pipeline}",
    "ActivityName": "Send Email On Error",
    "Message": "Already an export file in the Cerrejon export folder"
}

resources.name: [concat(parameters('factoryName'), '/Copy Arima Qty from Azure Dev to IMAFS AI Prod MTL')]

source.sqlReaderQuery: select unique_id,ds,AutoARIMA from FORECAST_RESULT_ARIMA_QTY order by unique_id, ds

SELECT        DEMAND_HIST_PERIOD.item_id, DEMAND_HIST_PERIOD.date, DEMAND_HIST_PERIOD.qty, DEMAND_HIST_PERIOD.hits, DEMAND_HIST_PERIOD.real_data_flag, ITEMS.Intermittent
FROM            DEMAND_HIST_PERIOD INNER JOIN
                         ITEMS ON DEMAND_HIST_PERIOD.item_id = ITEMS.item_id
WHERE        (DEMAND_HIST_PERIOD.date < dbo.ACTIVE_MONTH_VAR()) AND (DEMAND_HIST_PERIOD.item_id <= 128900862) AND (ITEMS.Intermittent = 0)
ORDER BY DEMAND_HIST_PERIOD.item_id, DEMAND_HIST_PERIOD.date

SELECT        DEMAND_HIST_PERIOD.item_id, DEMAND_HIST_PERIOD.date, DEMAND_HIST_PERIOD.qty, DEMAND_HIST_PERIOD.hits, DEMAND_HIST_PERIOD.real_data_flag, ITEMS.Intermittent
FROM            DEMAND_HIST_PERIOD INNER JOIN
                         ITEMS ON DEMAND_HIST_PERIOD.item_id = ITEMS.item_id
WHERE        (DEMAND_HIST_PERIOD.date < dbo.ACTIVE_MONTH_VAR()) AND (DEMAND_HIST_PERIOD.item_id <= 128900862) AND (ITEMS.Intermittent = 0)
ORDER BY DEMAND_HIST_PERIOD.item_id, DEMAND_HIST_PERIOD.date

resources.name: [concat(parameters('factoryName'), '/Export Forecast Data Lake to Blob to SQL')]

activities.name: Import AI Demand from Azure Blob Storage

dependsOn.activity: Copy Qty Qty_Adj Demand AI Storage to Blob_copy1

typeProperties.notebookPath: /Users/jmichaud@rpmglobal.com/Import AI Demand from Azure Blob Storage

activities.name: Export AI Forecast to Azure Blob Storage

typeProperties.notebookPath: /Users/jmichaud@rpmglobal.com/Export ARIMA Qty to Azure Blob Storage

activities.name: Copy Demand Demand From Canroy to Ai Storage
Copy Multi Variables Demand AI Storage to Blob

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT [item_id]
      ,[MONTHDATE]
      ,[qty]
      ,[qty_adj]
      ,[Intermittent]
      ,[saisonalite]
      ,[class]
      ,[family_descrp]
      ,[criticality]
      ,[Nb_Month_Zero_Demand]
      ,[lead_time]
      ,[CONTRACT]
      ,[preferred_tr_mode]
  FROM [dbo].[DHP_TO_FORECAST_TEMP]
    order by item_id, MONTHDATE

activities.name: Copy Qty Qty_Adj Demand AI Storage to Blob_copy1

dependsOn.activity: Copy Demand Demand From Canroy to Ai Storage

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT [item_id]
      ,[MONTHDATE]
      ,[qty]
      ,[qty_adj]
  FROM [dbo].[DHP_TO_FORECAST_TEMP]
  where item_id <= 20200862
  order by item_id, MONTHDATE

dependsOn.activity: Import AI Demand from Azure Blob Storage

activities.name: Copy CANROY Demand Demand From Canroy to Ai Storage

dependsOn.activity: Import AI Demand from SQL Table

activities.name: Import AI Demand from SQL Table

dependsOn.activity: Copy CANROY Demand Demand From Canroy to Ai Storage
